name: AdMatter
tag_list: advertising, online-marketing, ad-exchange, ad-network, search-marketing, keyword-marketing, marketing
overview:
AdMatter is an online and mobile ad exchange that connects thousands of advertisers and publishers through a real time bidding system. AdMatter’s focus is on delivering highly targeted and relevant ads to Internet users that maximize ROI for advertisers and yield for publishers. AdMatter cuts out the middlemen in the ad industry, simplifies the online advertising and monetization process for advertisers and publishers, and make online advertising easier and more effective.

AdMatter’s proprietary user targeting system called “SureTarget” enables highly targeted profiling of users based on behavior and demographics such as keywords, page content, geo-location, demographics, and browsing behavior. Advertisers can display their ads to the exact target market in real time and publishers have an automated system for having their traffic segmented into intent and interest categories that are attractive to advertisers. This results in higher ROI for advertisers, higher yield for publishers, and more relevant and attractive ads for consumers.
